Title: Regularized theta lifts and (1,1)-currents on GSpin Shimura varieties
Abstract: © 2016 Mathematical Sciences Publishers.We introduce a regularized theta lift for reductive dual pairs (Sp4,O(V)), for V a quadratic vector space over a totally real number field. The lift takes values in the space of (1,1)-currents on the Shimura variety attached to GSpin(V); we show its values are cohomologous to currents given by integration on special divisors against automorphic Green functions. A later paper will show how to evaluate the new lift on differential forms obtained as usual (nonregularized) theta lifts.
